title: Roasted figs with balsamic vinegar

default: 2 fresh figs, cut into four quarters

steps: Place the vinegar and sugar in a small saucepan and cook at a medium heat until the sugar has dissolved.
Add the fig pieces and cook until they are soft and caramelised.
Place the griddled ciabatta bread on a plate and place the figs on top.
To serve, drizzle the yoghurt and the honey on top and scatter over the thyme leaves.
